div.head: 膿血痢
div.div: , free-flux illness with pus and blood

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: , free-flux illness with pus and blood

sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , ailment of free-flux illness, with thin stool carrying pus and blood. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 17: 夏月多苦膿血痢 , “During summer one often suffers from free-flux illness with pus and blood ”. Nong zhong 膿腫 , swelling with pus [2]

Pathological Condition Combined Designation of chuang yang 瘡瘍 , sores, with an obvious swelling that includes pus but has not opened to fester yet. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 30: 憂思損傷，氣積聚，腹中甚 痛，作膿腫 , “Harm caused by grief and pondering results in qi accumulation and collection with heavy pain in the abdomen that eventually transforms into swelling with pus ”.
